snippet: In a report published by The Dallas Morning News on Sunday, the Texas emergency room physician who misdiagnosed the first case of Ebola in the United States acknowledged his error.
abstract: Dr Joseph Howard Meier, emergency room doctor at Texas Health Presbyterian Hospital in Dallas, acknowledges his error in misdiagnosing first case of Ebola in the United States, in his first public comments on treatment of patient Thomas Eric Duncan, who later died.
lead_paragraph: In a report published by The Dallas Morning News on Sunday, the Texas emergency room physician who misdiagnosed the first case of Ebola in the United States acknowledged his error.

headline.main: Dallas Doctor in Ebola Case Say Treatment Based on What He Knew at Time
headline.print_headline: Dallas Physician in Nation’s First Ebola Case Acknowledges Errors in Treatment
